title: The Stolen Queen
description: Lily never asked to be queen of Klingland. She loves King Henry with all her heart, but she often feels like a fish out of water. When she discovers a kingdom of merpeople beneath the waves, she encounters someone she never expected to see again. Tensions rise as she struggles to uncover a dangerous mystery and return to her home on land before itâ€™s too late.
author: Lisa Dawn
